Events.OnTargetChosen:
(block ( (targetObj (@ gData 'targetObj))
; The reward for the station is half of the standard ; treasure value for the station.
(rewardExact (/ (obj@ targetObj 'stdTreasure) 2))
; Round it to the nearest 100
(reward (max 100 (* 100 (round (/ rewardExact 100))))) ) (msnSet@ gSource 'reward reward) )

Language.Text:
Your mission is to destroy %targetName% in %systemName%.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: %payment%

You are at Commonwealth Militia Headquarters. The officer of the watch looks up from his displays:
"Are you looking for a mission, pilot?"

"%TargetName% is hiding among the outer asteroids. We want you to go out there and destroy it.
"We'll pay you %payment% if you succeed. Clear?"
"We've uploaded the coordinates of the target to your computer. Good luck, pilot!"
"Why don't you make yourself useful and get us some tea or something."
"You haven't completed your mission! Don't return until you have!"
"Well done! You dealt with that threat expertly. We've deposited %payment% in your account."
"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!"
